DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study evaluate safety tolerability ONO-2952 across ascend single dos healthy adult male female subject . The secondary objective characterize pharmacokinetic ( PK ) profile ONO-2952 . The tertiary objective study preliminarily evaluate effect meal upon PK profile ONO-2952 .
DOC.brief_title: Single-Dose Study Evaluate Safety , Tolerability , Pharmacokinetics ONO-2952 Healthy Adult Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy nonsmoking male female subject ( 1855 inclusive ) Body mass index ( BMI ) 1935 kg/m2 ( inclusive ) For female , surgically sterilize , postmenopausal , non lactate agree use double barrier method contraception History presence clinically significant disease
